meanings.sent1: The cake was fantabulous, with its delicious frosting.
meanings.sent2: She had a fantabulous time at the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The fantabulous sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: The team's fantabulous performance on the field amazed the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The fantabulous fireworks display lit up the night sky with brilliance.

meanings.definition: Of an extraordinary or remarkable quality.
meanings.sent1: The magician's fantabulous tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: The artist's painting was truly fantabulous, showcasing great talent.
meanings.sent3: The fantabulous invention revolutionized the way people communicate.
meanings.sent4: Her fantabulous voice filled the concert hall with pure magic.
meanings.sent5: The fantabulous view from the mountaintop took their breath away.
